description:
Jujutsu Kaisen - Itadori Yuuji
The art is taken from the opening of the anime and retraced quite a bit for a higher resolution/quality.


[list][h1]Features:[/h1]
[*]X-Ray on Markings
[*]3D Clock
[*]Audio Visualizer
[/list]


『  Disclaimer  』
All Jujutsu Kaisen art is credited to their respective owner, MAPPA Studio.  I don't own any of the art, I just edited it a little and used it to animate the wallpaper for fun.  If needed, I can remove it.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/pCWV5rX.png[/img]

If you liked it, rate it 5 stars.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/Wf3GCHE.png[/img]

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/id/eesbad/myworkshopfiles/?appid=730][img]http://i.imgur.com/82a3yNw.png[/img][/url]


『 Changelog 』
Nov. 13:
+ Updated so that you can toggle on/off the 3D clock, Audio Visualizer, X-Ray in the properties!
[img]https://i.imgur.com/6Gk5lNj.png[/img]
Nov. 28:
+ Added toggle for sun rays
+ Fixed hair on electric cables
+ Reduced active texture memory to 325, used to be 388
- Not much can be done for the memory since xray takes a lot, you can toggle off some of the features if it lags
title: Jujutsu Kaisen - Itadori Yuuji (X-Ray Markings)
